trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents an open connection to a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x XXX Xxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This class cannot be inherited.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The connection used to open the SQL Server database.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xxx XXX Xxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The connection ID of the most recent connection attempt, regardless of whether the attempt succeeded or failed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx XX xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The connection ID of the most recent connection attempt.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx XX xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the string used to open a SQL Server database.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx x XXX Xxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The connection string that includes the source database name, and other parameters needed to establish the initial connection.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx$ xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is an empty string.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An invalid connection string argument has been supplied, or a required connection string argument has not been supplied.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx$ xx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the time to wait while trying to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx $xx xxxxxxx$ xx xxxx xxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is 15 seconds.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx 00 xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value set is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxx xx xxxx xxxx 0.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the name of the current database or the database to be used after a connection is opened.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xx xxxx xxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used after a connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xx xxxx xxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is an empty string.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the name of the instance of SQL Server to which to connect.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx XXX Xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the instance of SQL Server to which to connect.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx XXX Xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is an empty string.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the size (in bytes) of network packets used to communicate with an instance of SQL Server.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx $xx xxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx XXX Xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The size (in bytes) of network packets.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx $xx xxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is 8000.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx 0000.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a string that contains the version of the instance of SQL Server to which the client is connected.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx XXX Xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The version of the instance of SQL Server.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx XXX Xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

When set to true, enables statistics gathering for the current connection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns true if statistics gathering is enabled; otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
false is the default.

\n
trans-unit.target: $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a string that identifies the database client.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A string that identifies the database client.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the name of the client computer.
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
If neither is specified, the value is an empty string.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Occurs when SQL Server returns a warning or informational message.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx XXX Xxxxxx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Starts a database transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object representing the new transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx Xxxxxxxx Xxxxxx Xxxxxx Xxxx $XXXX$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Starts a database transaction with the specified isolation level.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The isolation level under which the transaction should run.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object representing the new transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx Xxxxxxxx Xxxxxx Xxxxxx Xxxx $XXXX$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Starts a database transaction with the specified isolation level and transaction name.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The isolation level under which the transaction should run.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object representing the new transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx Xxxxxxxx Xxxxxx Xxxxxx Xxxx $XXXX$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Starts a database transaction with the specified transaction name.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object representing the new transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx Xxxxxxxx Xxxxxx Xxxxxx Xxxx $XXXX$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the database to use instead of the current database.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The database name is not valid.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The connection is not open.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Cannot change the database.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Empties the connection pool.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Empties the connection pool associated with the specified connection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Closes the connection to the database.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The connection-level error that occurred while opening the connection.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Cannot open a connection without specifying a data source or server.

or

The connection is already open.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx x xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$xx$$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

There are two entries with the same name in the section.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxx $xxxxxx$$xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx$$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The cancellation instruction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A task representing the asynchronous operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Any error returned by SQL Server that occurred while opening the connection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xx XXX Xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

If statistics gathering is enabled, all values are reset to zero.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns a name value pair collection of statistics at the point in time the method is called.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x
